title: 3DMGAME Mortal Kombat Komplete Edition Update 1 and Crack By 3DM
description:
Mortal Kombat Komplete Edition Update 1
        (c) Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment


         DATE ......2014-07-23    Game Type ....Action

         DISK(s) ... -            Protection ...Steam




      Changelog:


      Updated the game launcher
    o Added video card selection option
    - Fixes auto-detection problems on laptops with Optimus technology
    - Solves performance issues for many laptops with dual GPUs
    o Added support for letterbox display toggle
    - Fixes problems with 4:3 and 5:4 aspect ratios
    Several performance optimizations
    Changed video settings options
    o Added ability to toggle memory restriction
    - Removed region lock for multiplayer matchmaking
    o Allows for a larger pool of online players
    - However, very long distance matches may experience slower network performance
    Improvements to online multiplayer
    o Fixed issues with Private Matches
    o Updated KOTH
    o Fixed multiplayer crashes
    Fixes and updates for several peripherals
    Removed microphone support from voice chat
    o Players may use Steam Chat




1. Install Mortal Kombat Komplete Edition        
2. Install the update from the update /dir     
   to main game directory                  
3. Copy crack to game directory       
4. Play!
